attributes.action: give Ghurkas fighting or who have fought in the british army full British citizenship and pension
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Gurkhas are some of our most loyal and brave soldiers in our army. However only soldiers enrolling recently have been granted the full army pension. The Gurkhas are an excellent regiment, the Government should therefore grant all Ghurkas (veterans included) the same army pension for their service and full british citizenship.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "give Ghurkas fighting or who have fought in the british army full British citizenship and pension."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
